item.title: EP 330 - The Drowned Ghosts Of The SS Valencia
item.itunes:title: The Drowned Ghosts Of The SS Valencia
item.description:
Today we dodge boiling bull juice, then we take a trip on the ill-fated SS Valencia!

Patreon

https://www.patreon.com/user?u=18482113

 

MERCH STORE!!!

https://www.redbubble.com/people/deadrabbitradio/works/35749420-dead-rabbit-radio?asc=u

 

Help Promote Dead Rabbit!

Dual Flyer

https://i.imgur.com/OhuoI2v.jpg

"As Above" Flyer 

https://i.imgur.com/yobMtUp.jpg

 

Sundiver’s Debut Album “Orion”  on Spotify!
https://open.spotify.com/album/7Cf75kTvlvIzFZiPYpLHUY?si=vwG7J7G9SwG0EwjvmJiX9Q

 

MASSIVE SEMEN EXPLOSION AFTER BLAZE HITS BULL ARTIFICIAL INSEMINATION FACILITY, FIREFIGHTERS FORCED TO DODGE 'PROJECTILES'

https://www.newsweek.com/fire-bull-semen-explosion-farm-australia-1459673

 

Genetics laboratory fire in Yarram destroys 100 cryogenic cylinders containing cattle semen

https://www.abc.net.au/news/2019-09-17/cattle-semen-destroyed-in-overnight-yarram-fire/11519492

 

Bull semen sells for $67k at auction as record broken for sale of wagyu cattle

https://www.abc.net.au/news/2019-05-11/bull-semen-fetches-for-tens-of-thousands-of-dollars-at-auction/11103932

 

SS Valencia

https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/SS_Valencia#

 

Wreck of the SS Valencia

https://www.atlasobscura.com/places/wreck-of-the-ss-valencia

 

SS Valencia

https://www.nightwatchparanormal.com/ss-valencia.html

 

Valencia, SS, the Wreck of (1906)

https://www.historylink.org/File/7382

 

Dead reckoning

https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dead_reckoning

 

Listen to the daily podcast anywhere you listen to podcasts!

 

------------------------------------------------

Logo Art By Ash Black

 

"As Above" Art By Grant Scott

 

Dead Rabbit Skull By John from the SCAR Group

 

Halloween Monster By Finn

 

Opening Song: "Atlantis Attacks"

Closing Song: "Bella Royale"

Music By Dr. Huxxxtable

Rabbitron 3000 created by Eerbud

Thanks to Chris K, Founder Of The Golden Rabbit Brigade

 

http://www.DeadRabbit.com

Email: DeadRabbitRadio@gmail.com

Twitter: @DeadRabbitRadio

Facebook: www.Facebook.com/DeadRabbitRadio

 

Paranormal, Conspiracy, and True Crime news as it happens! Jason Carpenter breaks the stories they'll be talking about tomorrow, assuming the world doesn't end today.

 

All Contents Of This Podcast Copyright Jason Carpenter 2018 - 2019
